name: interstratification
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the existence of layers between other layers: Detailed studies of the area emphasize the interstratification of sedimentary and igneous rocks. Our findings indicate little or no interstratification with other types of layer. Related word
interstratify
More examplesFewer examplesEverywhere there is interstratification of agglomerate with volcanic deposits.A clue to the origin of the rock can be found in the interstratification of the beds.The wide dispersal and interstratification of beds of ash and pumice are interpreted as recording rapid alternations between different types of volcanic eruption.
